page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The 12 square kilometers that our school has got to cover consists of, is: Shropshire Union Canal Staffordshire & Worcester Canal Pendeford Hall Dowty Boulton & Paul Coven Heath, and other places. These places are in the Wolverhampton area. In this area we have 7 farms the names are: Long Birch farm, Shawhall farm, Old Mill farm, Lower Pendeford farm, The Hattons, Upper Pendeford farm, Lesscroft farm. The Staffordshire & Worcester canal runs North to South and the River Penk runs North to West. The little brook which runs through the village of Bilbrook is a tributary of the River Penk.
